snippet: GOTLIEB--Bernice, on May 6, 2016. Beloved wife of the late David. Devoted mother, grandmother and great-grandmother. Service Sunday, May 8th, 11am, Mt. Judah Cemetery. Farewell Grandma Bunny. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GOTLIEB--Bernice, on May 6, 2016. Beloved wife of the late David. Devoted mother, grandmother and great-grandmother. Service Sunday, May 8th, 11am, Mt. Judah Cemetery. Farewell Grandma Bunny. 1/3
